data.name: Drift Stage
data.detailed_description:
Drift Stage is a drift-focused arcade racer with intuitive mechanics and fluid high-speed action.

Features

  • Loaded Roster of Exotic Cars - Explore an array of vehicles ranging from JDM tuners to Italian sports cars to find the car with the style and handling to match your taste and driving style.
  • Tracks in Beautiful and Unique Locales - Race through blue-sky sunny beaches, neon-infused urban highways, and more unique and beautiful locales.
  • Online and Split-Screen Multiplayer Drifting - Tear up the asphalt with friends in online and split-screen multiplayer.
  • Rocking Original Music - A large original soundtrack from the softshred virtuoso Hugh Myrone that will make you want to crank your car radio.
data.about_the_game:
Drift Stage is a drift-focused arcade racer with intuitive mechanics and fluid high-speed action.

Features

  • Loaded Roster of Exotic Cars - Explore an array of vehicles ranging from JDM tuners to Italian sports cars to find the car with the style and handling to match your taste and driving style.
  • Tracks in Beautiful and Unique Locales - Race through blue-sky sunny beaches, neon-infused urban highways, and more unique and beautiful locales.
  • Online and Split-Screen Multiplayer Drifting - Tear up the asphalt with friends in online and split-screen multiplayer.
  • Rocking Original Music - A large original soundtrack from the softshred virtuoso Hugh Myrone that will make you want to crank your car radio.
data.short_description: Tear up the asphalt in the neon-infused and blue sky locales that Drift Stage drivers call home. With intuitive mechanics and fluid high-speed racing, a loaded roster of exclusive exotic cars to drive, and an original soundtrack by legendary soft-shredder Hugh Myrone, the arcade racer is back.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or higher, ATI X1600 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Baster or better.
  • Additional Notes: Gameplay experience around 30 FPS on average when using the Mid-High settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+ or higher
  • Processor: 2.5 - 4.0 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 460 (1024 MB) AMD Radeon R7 260X (2048 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Baster or better.
  • Additional Notes: Gameplay experience around 60 FPS on average when using the Mid-High settings

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Processor or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or higher, ATI X1600 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Baster or better.
  • Additional Notes: Should run on anything Direct X 9.0+ Capabale.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.5 - 4.0 GHz Processor or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 460 (1024 MB) AMD Radeon R7 260X (2048 MB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Baster or better.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or similar, SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Processor or Faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or higher, ATI X1600 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Baster or better.
  • Additional Notes: Linux builds are unstable by nature due to distro variations. If you're running an uncommon version of Linux, please report your bugs to the disccusion fourm.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or similar, SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.5 - 4.0 GHz Processor or Faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 460 (1024 MB) AMD Radeon R7 260X (2048 MB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Baster or better.
  • Additional Notes: Linux builds are unstable by nature due to distro variations. If you're running an uncommon version of Linux, please report your bugs to the disccusion fourm.
